thread.title: Global PC Shipments Decline in Q3 - NewsFactor
thread.title_full: Global PC Shipments Decline in Q3 - NewsFactor - Discussion on Topix

author: topix.com
title: Global PC Shipments Decline in Q3 - NewsFactor
text:
There are 1 comment on the NewsFactor story from 15 hrs ago, titled Global PC Shipments Decline in Q3 . In it, NewsFactor reports that:
More bad news for the PC industry. Although 71 million units shipped in the third quarter of 2015, that number marks a year-over-year decline of almost 11 percent -- even worse than 9.2 percent decline analysts predicted.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at NewsFactor.
